About me

ZNeBur

I'm a freelance artist, videographer, developer, and researcher from Mauritius ðŸ‡²ðŸ‡º.
Holder of a BSc Degree in Physics with computing from the University of Mauritius,
I'm passionate about applying my knowledge to key topics such as climate change,
physical oceanography, image/video processing and acoustic engineering.

Interests

Videography

For the art of capturing moments and emotions; using filmmaking gear such mirror-less cameras, drones, gimbals, audio equipment, video editing software and so on.

Research

Applying my background knowledge in computational physics in the field of climate change, physical oceanography, geomatics, image processing and acoustic engineering.

Development

Developing workflows, processing pipelines, visualisations, automation using various programming languages and software to support my works.
